title: internal compiler error: complexgen: unknown op CONVNOP
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. 6g bork.go

What is the expected output?

code should compile

What do you see instead?

complexgen: unknown op [7fd443710cb8]
.   CONVNOP u(2) l(12) tc(1) complex128
.   .   NAME-c u(1) a(1) g(104) l(10) x(0+0) class(PAUTO) f(1) ld(1) tc(1) used(1) T
bork.go:12: internal compiler error: complexgen: unknown op CONVNOP

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

weekly.2011-09-07

Please provide any additional information below.

the extra type cast is unnecessary, but it shouldn't crash the compiler.
Attachments: 1. bork.go (162 bytes)
